attributes.action: Resident Disabled Persons Bays WITH CAR REGISTRATION
attributes.additional_details: At present there are many many cars with Blue Badges occupying every Disabled Persons Parking space. There are such bays in all public places. Create a new group of Disabled Person's Parking Bays' by creating a sub group. A Disabled Person's Parking Bay requested specifically for a disabled person's use OUTSIDE his/her HOUSE should belong to this subgroup. This Residents Disabled Persons Parking bay SHOULD have the REGISTRATION of the car, normally used by the disabled driver ON THE POST. When a substitute car is used, displaying a Blue Badge and THEN it receives a penalty ticket this IS A MITIGATING CIRCUMSTANCE and the ticket should be cancelled on appeal to the issuing office provided evidence of HAVING TO USE REPLACEMENT CAR is supplied.
